Articles.Content: yes i have winrar

Hmm. im not sure whats going on. The skillful manager file should be zipped into the IDskillfulR1 folder. Click on it there and a winrar window should pop up with the manager.bat file. when you click this it should tell you what to do
i ges this mod just does not like me well this mod is not for me

i ges this mod just does not like me well this mod is not for me

Im sorry to hear that. Did you download the newest skillful? its from a few days ago.

Ummm... Skillful seems to duplicate most of the B9 parts for me... why? Is it because of the B9CFGEdits folder? I've applied edit via the .bat file, but now i have 2 sets of landing gear, lights, wings, fuel tank/fuselages, science equipment and reaction wheels. But interestingly it hasn't duplicated any B9 engines or Pods (apart from the 1.25m heavy guidance unit)... This is annoying, is there a fix?

EDIT: And no, it hasn't copied any Stock, Boat Parts or Procedural Wings parts

Edited May 20, 2014 by Random Tank

... also it worked fine with this version of module manager which has the extension built in that all lets you use wild cards and loads before the game so it seems to.

all i added was this to to the skillful directory in game data

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/11863219/skillfulPatch.cfg

try what i said worked for me.

Ummm... Skillful seems to duplicate most of the B9 parts for me... why? Is it because of the B9CFGEdits folder? I've applied edit via the .bat file, but now i have 2 sets of landing gear, lights, wings, fuel tank/fuselages, science equipment and reaction wheels. But interestingly it hasn't duplicated any B9 engines or Pods (apart from the 1.25m heavy guidance unit)... This is annoying, is there a fix?

also delete that folder as well as the procedural wing and squad from the skillful directory after if you do it the bat way

Ahhh right, I didn't know you only keep the folder or do the .bat, thanks!
Is there any way tp reload the dual 14' turret? I have a orbital defense station but have failed to find an ammo box rhat carries 14' rounds.

Is there any way tp reload the dual 14' turret? I have a orbital defense station but have failed to find an ammo box rhat carries 14' rounds.

Its the giant circular mount that would fit underneath the 14" turret that holds its ammo; it holds slightly more than another clip

The ones in skillful... the armour plates and rocket launchers. Are they not implemented for research?

Glad to see that someone read the manual. But what would be the point of having weapons in career mode anyways?

This mod is looking good, I spent last night making a BM-13 Katyusha, and a Patrol Boat. Can't say how fun this is.

I'm looking forward to more updates in the future. Tonight I plan to build an Self Propelled Gun.

Which gets me to my wishlist.

76mm , 88mm, 105mm Ap Tank Guns

105mm, 155mm, 240mm HE Howitzers

More armor plating.... Thanks

I wish you the best of luck.

yes this is allso me wish list.

it a good wish list!

I don't know about more armor plating but I made module manager cfg that makes the hollow structure mod the same as the armor , really good for large ships and bases if anyones interested
